channel.title: Error, 'Invalid method declaration'

item.title: Error, 'Invalid method declaration'
item.dc:creator: @FinalFantasy FinalFantasy
item.description:
@FinalFantasy wrote:

use this instead:

	 public void ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsUnderAttack = false;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].StartKilling = 0;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x328;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
		server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
        	faceNPC = 65535;
            	faceNPCupdate = true;
		return true;
	}

Read full topic

item.title: Error, 'Invalid method declaration'
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

[code] }

 ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) {
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].IsUnderAttack = false;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].StartKilling = 0;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].RandomWalk = true;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x328;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].animUpdateRequired = true;
	server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCID].updateRequired = true;
    	faceNPC = 65535;
        	faceNPCupdate = true;
	return true;
}[/code]

Thatâ€™s the code, this is the error.

client.java:15733: invalid method declaration; return type required ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^
